name: Dr. Amina Rahman
description: Dr. Amina specializes in small animal surgery and emergency care. With over 8 years of experience, she provides expert treatment for pets with compassion and precision.

name: Dr. Mehedi Hasan
description: Dr. Mehedi is a certified veterinary nutritionist who designs personalized diet plans for dogs and cats.

name: Dr. Nusrat Chowdhury
description: Dr.Nusrat helps pets overcome anxiety, aggression, and behavioral problems using gentle and science-backed training methods.

name: Dr.Nabila Khan
description: Dr. Nabila Khan is a senior consultant with over 12 years of experience in pet medicine and vaccination.
